mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.cover_work_num AS "coverWorkNum", a.cover_work_id AS "coverWorkId", a.area AS "area", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.signin_person_id AS "signInPersonId", a.signin_person_name AS "signInPersonName", a.signin_time AS "signInTime", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_work_inspection( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, cover_work_num, cover_work_id, area, longitude, latitude, signin_person_id, signin_person_name, signin_time, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{coverWorkNum}, #{coverWorkId}, #{area}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{signInPersonId}, #{signInPersonName}, #{signInTime}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_work_inspection SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, cover_work_num = #{coverWorkNum}, cover_work_id = #{coverWorkId}, area = #{area}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, signin_person_id = #{signInPersonId}, signin_person_name = #{signInPersonName}, signin_time = #{signInTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
